name: Distorted Reflection
description:
Welcome to the second abomination of level design By waza_dev

🔥🔥STILL IN DEVELOPMENT🔥🔥

In Distorted reflection you play as a square and its reflection to solve "puzzles" and complete levels, your reflection is separate to you but you are linked and cant proceed far without one another

Don't let the discription full you this game is BAD

controls

WASD - To move

R - to restart

Q/E to switch

Escape to go to main menu

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
